title: ECB Decision Gives TLT a Positive Tilt
text:
The decision out of the European Central Bank is likely to have a long-term effect on U.S. interest-rate yields no matter what the FOMC doesWith the ECB attempting to force negative interest rate policy (NIRP) across all of Europe there is going to develop a carry trade between U.S. and EU countriesFor instance, why in the world would I not want t...
